summary.para: Gets information about the media sharing device.

param.name: pDevice
param.para: A pointer to a structure. The method fills in this structure with the device information.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The method allocates memory for the BSTR members of the structure. The caller must free the memory for each BSTR by calling SysFreeString.
